title: Theme Options

fields.label: Secondary CTA
fields.name: secondary_cta
fields.instructions: This is the default CTA used in the site CTA Banner.

fields.label: Primary CTA
fields.name: primary_cta
fields.instructions: This is the default CTA used in the site navigation and CTA Banner.

fields.label: Social Ratings
fields.name: social_ratings
fields.instructions: Use this section to give social proof to your site, by listing your ratings across social platforms. Stars are SVGs and color change is in the CSS.

fields.label: Trust Factor Logos
fields.name: trust_factor_logos
fields.instructions: Add logos for industry partners, certifications, awards or products you offer. Files should be PNG or SVG.

description: Controls core theme content and options.
